snippet.title: 1080 Snowboarding Trailer 1998
snippet.description:
1080 Snowboarding Trailer 1998

Official Content From Nintendo Of America

Push the boundary of realism and feel the intensity of hi-flying downhill snowboarding. Six tracks are loaded with different terrains from ice and hard packed snow to deep powder. But like all good snowboarders you've got to stay on the path. It's your chance to become the best hotdogger this side of Aspen. Killer.
Platforms: Nintendo 64

Nintendo 64
, Sports,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, 1080 Snowboarding
